content.sentence: Hey cutie. Haven’t talked to you in a while. Thought I’d say hello!
Sweet dreams….with me in them
Oooooh, I like the sound of that
Follow up with… Tell me more
Happy Birthday! If you could have one wish, what would it be?
I’m trying on these new bras, but I need a second opinion. Care to share your thoughts?
Come over, I have all your favorites. Pizza, beer, and of course, ME.
OMG, you were amazing last night.
I was just telling my friends about you. They’re so jealous
I had a dream about you last night. It was definitely R-rated…
I’ve been a bad girl today. I need a spanking.
Talk dirty to me.
Dang, you look extra hot today.
Have you been working out?
Mmm, come over here. I want to touch you.
Can’t wait to see you XOXO
Hey, I was wondering, do you believe in love at first sight? Or do I need to walk by you again?
I just woke up and you’re already on my mind.
Mmm, sexy. I love a man who can (fill in the blank).
I know you have a busy day ahead of you, but could you add me on to your to-do list?
You have the most amazingsmile.
Can’t wait to see you tonight. I think you’re going to like what you see
Hmm, should I wear the red panties or the black ones? Can’t decide..
I could seriously use a little bit of testosterone in my life..
When he asks what you’re doing, tell him you just got out of the shower.
I’ve been thinking about you all day.
Good morning handsome. Have a great day!
Would you rather do you homework or come hang out with me?
Ugh, I have a problem. I can’t stop thinking about you.
You look good in that new shirt.
Blue is definitely your color
Ugh, I’ve had a horrible day. I need to unwind…
Can you guess the color of the underwear I’m wearing?
I’ve never met a man who can (fill in the blank) as well as you.
If I were with you right now, what would we be doing?
I’m trying to fall asleep, but I can’t stop thinking about you!
I’m just laying in bed, bored. Care to join?
I really like our friendship, but I was thinking… maybe we could be friends with benefits?
Let’s hang out tonight. I promise you won’t regret it
Let’s play 20 question. What’s your name? What’s your favorite color? Wanna go out with me Saturday night?
Randomly text him… Hey! Stop thinking about me!
Come over now.
Guess what I’m wearing right now.
Don’t waste all of your energy at work today. You’ll need some extra energy for later…
Ugh, I was rushing out of the house and totally forgot to wear a bra.
I found my old cheerleading outfit. It still fits…
This homework is killing me! I can’t do anymore. Save me?
Good luck on your game tonight. You’ll do awesome and look sexy doing it
We just landed in Hawaii. Ugh, I wish you were here!
Follow up with… it hasn’t all been rated G either.
Send me a picture
Where have you been hiding?
Hey you
I’m so bored! Wanna go on an adventure?
I want to take you home with me and pleasure you in ways you didn’t know possible.
You make me feel so (fill in the blank).
I love your lips.
If I could rearrange the alphabet, I would definitely put U and I together.
I enjoy just thinking about you. I enjoy even more texting you, but the thing I enjoy most is being with YOU.
Every time I see you, my heart skips a beat, every time I hear your voice, I smile.
When I’m texting you, you should know that I’m smiling.
Dreaming of you makes my nights worth while, just thinking of you makes me smile. Being with you is the best thing ever and loving you is what I’ll do forever…
You know you are in love when you read a thousand love quotes and there’s one person you think about the whole time.
I love it when my fingers are entangled in your’s and my head is on your chest..listening to your heart beat. It makes me feel so safe…like nothing bad can happen to me…
When I see you, I get butterflies. When I talk to you, I get tongue-tied. When you touch me, I feel like I can fly.
Your smile is like a sunrise, it sets the clouds on fire. But just being with you, is what I always admire.
Hey you, you make me act like an idiot if you are close to me.
I chose you & you chose me, was that not enough reason that this was meant to be?
I got that Buzz Lightyear love for you, it’s to infinity & beyond.
I won’t chase you forever, stop running.
All females need males. Barbie needs her Ken, Minnie needs her Mickey, Cinderella needs her prince, and I need you!
If I could rearrange the letters of the ABCs, I would put U and I together and next to each other forever.
I can’t help but to stare in your eyes and daydream about all we should be.
Dear Crush, don’t be scared if a fat guy in a red suit snatches you away on Christmas Eve. Sincerely, You Were On My Wish List.
The truth is, if I could be with anyone, it’d still be you.
You like me and I like you so why aren’t we together?
I’m starting to like you less… because I’m starting to love you more…
You’re just like a camera . Whenever I see you , I smile
I feel death for a while when you accidentally touch my hand.
Love is when I can’t pay attention in class because I’m too busy writing her first name with my last name.
Yeah, I talk to other people, I laugh with other people, and I hug other people, but none of them will ever mean as much to me as you…
If every word I said could make you smile, I’d talk forever.
I still get butterflies even though I’ve seen you a hundred times.
Butterflies? I feel the entire zoo in my stomach when I see you.
When you know why you like someone it’s a crush. When you have no idea why you like someone it’s love.
That awkward moment when you get caught staring at your crush…
I want to be the reason behind your smile because you are the reason behind mine…
I like you a lottle, it’s like a little, except a lot.
Out of all the people I’ve ever met you are the one who makes me draw those silly little hearts on my papers.
My life is not perfect but every moment by your side is.
When I see you, my HEART beats a little faster. My STOMACH feels little lighter. My SMILE shines a little brighter.
No matter how I feel, it’s always true, that the one thing that makes me smile, is you.
I want to be the reason why you fall asleep with your phone in your hand.
There is a reason why the letters U and I are NEXT TO EACH OTHER in the keyboard. Because its U and I are meant to be.
Just one message from you is enough to lift my spirits.
If I am asked to write any name without knowing how to write I’ll write your name because I kept you in my heart.
Some one love one, some one love two but I love and only one that’s you …!!!!!
If your heart was a prison, I would like to be Sentenced for life
I’ll keep on saying I love till the sun becomes ice
It’s not how I feel but how I still want to be with you when I put my feelings aside.
